short_definition: A failure to comply with a duty to one's own disadvantage; default means anything wrongful, an omission to do that which ought to have been done by one of the parties.
long_definition_html: A failure to comply with a duty to one's own disadvantage; default means anything wrongful, an omission to do that which ought to have been done by one of the parties.
long_definition_markdown: A failure to comply with a duty to one's own disadvantage; default means anything wrongful, an omission to do that which ought to have been done by one of the parties.
long_definition_text: A failure to comply with a duty to one's own disadvantage; default means anything wrongful, an omission to do that which ought to have been done by one of the parties.
